dialog: You must be the volunteer tester to help me test my game! Thank you very much!
Before we start testing, let me test your test skill :P
So first, there is a bug in this room.
You can click on objects with an alert in the game to check attributes of them.
When you met a bug(or we would say, reproduce a bug),
you can click on "FOUND IT" button then click on the object that cause the bug.
Now find the bug in the room!
Wow I'm impressed you find it so fast!
The wall says it will block you, but I didn't implement it -- on purpose!
Ok I'll fix the bug, you can't walk through the wall now.
I also added some new stuff, a real bug! Try it!
Hmm...When I say there is a bug in the room, it does not mean a real bug
Or it is really in the room.
